items.sentence: A loud noise woke Tom up in the middle of the night.
I told Tom that I didn't have anything to offer him.
Tom is babysitting over the summer to save up money.
Tom tries to learn at least one new thing every day.
Milk has to be kept at a relatively low temperature.
Until now, I've never been spoken to by a foreigner.
What are some reasons you should see a cardiologist?
Whose bicycle did you say that you wanted to borrow?
If you keep playing with fire, expect to get burned.
I get very angry when you don't answer my questions.
